A.title: Multiple Choice Questions (MCQs)
A.instructions: Choose the correct answer from the given options:

questions.question: 'The Prisoner of Zenda' is narrated by:
Rudolf Rassendyll belongs to the family of:
James Thurber wrote 'The Day the Dam Broke' after this number of years of incidence:
Sir Jacob Borrodalie was going to have an embassy where he would take Rassendyll as a/an:
The poem 'An Essay on Man' is a philosophical and religious dissertation on:
The story 'The Devoted Friend' begins with the conversation of:
Einstein hates property, outward success and:
Black Michael is the son of the previous king from his marriage called:
'As a man grows old he believes in fate. Fate send you here, Fate send you now to Strelsau.' These words were spoken by:
James Jones was found guilty of:
The novelist uses 'big boar' as a metaphor for:
'Heaven does not always make the right men kings.' The speaker is:
'The path of glory leads but to the grave.' The line is taken from the poem:
options: Elegy Written in a Country Churchyard
questions.correct_answer: Elegy Written in a Country Churchyard

questions.question: Mr. Jones was a supporter of this party:
Europe took lead in power after the rise of Greece and the conquests of:
Darius Conningway, a lawyer in the text 'The Day the Dam Broke' was speaking in the language of:
The Miller refused to give this object to Hans for fetching doctor for his son:
Alexander Pope calls it blessing for future:
The word 'satchel' means a:
The person who became the Prisoner of Zenda was:

B.title: Short Answer Questions
B.instructions: Attempt TEN part-questions from this section, selecting at least TWO part questions from each sub-section. All questions carry equal marks.

questions.question: What are Einstein's views about democracy?
What according to Bertrand Russell, the Asia countries should accept and reject from the West?
James Jones does not get a fair trial because of this poverty. Describe in terms of Act III of 'The Silver Box.'
What was the effect upon the character 'He' after meeting the Korean girl? OR How can we say that the Miller was responsible for Hans' death?
In what way is death a great teacher in the eyes of Alexander Pope?
What does Wordsworth guess about the theme of the girl's song in the poem 'The Solitary Reaper?'
How did Ulysses motivate his mariners to go on the last voyage?
What is the theme of 'Music When Soft Voices Die?'
Why did Black Michael hire 'The Six'?
Who persuades Rassendyll to impersonate as the king of Ruritania and why?
How does Flavia sacrifice her love for the sake of her duty towards the state of Ruritania?
Use any Two of the following pair of words in sentences (Four Sentences): sight, site; break, brake; stationery, stationary; their, there; eligible, illegible; dual, duel
Use any Two of the following phrasal verbs in sentences: take off, get on, run short of, check out, bring about
Match any Four of the following words of column 'A' with their meanings in column 'B'

C.title: Detailed Answer Questions
C.instructions: Answer all questions from this section. All questions carry equal marks.

questions.question: Write a character sketch of Duke Michael. OR Write the critical analysis of the poem, 'Lines From An Essay on Man' OR 'The Seven Ages of Man'.

Write an essay on any One of the following topics: i) Benefits of Chat GPT and AI ii) Influence of Social Media on Student's Performance iii) Importance of Cultural Diversity in Society iv) Pleasure of Reading Novels
Change the narration of the given sentences.
